column3: Naldiq & Vymelli's shipwright Hezzkhezl needs help heating his rivets.
Journey outside of the Moraby Drydocks and slay three lightning sprites for their cores.
You have collected three intact cores. Now deliver them to Hezzkhezl.
Hezzkhezl is delighted at your return, and tells you that it was <Emphasis>Victory</Emphasis> foreman Ahtbyrm who originally conceived the idea of using sprite cores to heat rivets.
Slay lightning sprites and obtain their cores.
Deliver the elemental cores to Hezzkhezl.
When it comes to rivetin', ye could search the realm over, but ye won't find none better than Hezzkhezl. Ten score rivets a bell, I drive. Twice that if I'm not in me cups!

The key to drivin' rivets proper-like is how hot ye can get the buggers. The hotter the rivet, the stronger the bond she'll make with the steel plate. Problem bein', was I to heat me rivets in the forge, they'd be cold as a dead whore's crotch by the time I hauled 'em back to the <Emphasis>Victory</Emphasis>.

'Tis why I use the white-hot cores o' lightnin' sprites...but as ye can see, me supply's runnin' a tad low. If it ain't too much trouble, would ye be so kind as to fetch me some? Ye look as if ye could take on a whole pack o' sprites with one hand tied behind yer arse.
Three cores, and I can be done with the day's work and back at the alehouse, where I belong.
Leviathan's eye! Ye really done gone an' fetched me the blinkin' cores! Ahtbyrm'll be right pleased to see that, he will.
'Twas the foreman what came up with the idea to use cores to heat the rivets. A clever one, that man. Sharper than a fang in a fishback's beak. Probably is why he made chief so quick, like.
